planning.total_time: PT10 minutes, plus defrosting and freezingM

ingredients.item: 450g bag essential Waitrose frozen exotic fruits
250g essential Waitrose low-fat Greek-style natural yogurt

instructions.step: Allow the fruit to defrost slightly at room temperature for about 1 hour.
Place in a food processor with the yogurt, honey and mint leaves, and whizz until smooth.
Scrape into a rigid container or 6 ramekins and freeze for an hour or more, until firm. If freezing overnight, place in the fridge for an hour before serving to soften.
